results.title: Eculizumab Use in Scleroderma Renal Crisis With Thrombotic Microangiopathy: A Case Report
results.text_hl: The multidisciplinary team elected to treat the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Immunologic_Deficiency_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007153 @@@terminal complement blockade@@@ using @CHEMICAL_eculizumab @CHEMICAL_MESH:C481642 @@@eculizumab@@@ in addition to high dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and blood pressure control.
